alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:02PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Box Elder County through 430 PM MDT... At 402 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Juniper, or 15 miles southwest of Snowville, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Locomotive Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
